attributes.action: Request Camlot, for a lotto Terminal at, 103 ,Victoria Road, Romford
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An application was put to Camlot over seven years ago for a lottery Terminal,I am still waiting and customers request is not heard, I have repeatedly made contact with camlot, to no positive response.Small Businesses need to survive also, not just big supermaeket's.
Please help the small business also.

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
